مرحباً فريق Arena Breakout Lite، أنا أستخدم هاتف Realme GT Master Edition بمعالج Snapdragon 778G، وأواجه تقطعات ملحوظة وانخفاض في الفريمات أثناء اللعب، رغم أنني ألعب على إعدادات منخفضة جداً واخترت 45 إطار فقط. هاتفي يدعم حتى 90 إطار في الثانية، ويعمل بسلاسة في ألعاب مثل PUBG وCall of Duty Mobile بدون أي مشاكل. أرفقت لكم تسجيل شاشة/صورة توضح المشكلة التي أواجهها داخل اللعبة. أرجو منكم تحسين التوافق والأداء على هذا المعالج، لأن اللعبة حالياً غير مستقرة على الرغم من أن العتاد قوي. وشكراً لكم.

This game is definitley in my top-three favorite FPS games. The extraction concept and the fact that even the smallest battlefield tasks are done by-hand is really a novelty. The downside is the incredible complexity. I find the loadout process mechanics not intuitive at all. The variety of med kits alone necessitates a good investment of playing time. Also, getting hungry/thirsty during a 15-30 min engagement is a bit over-the-top. But I give it 5 stars for the sheer developers' effort

Arena Breakout is a broken mess. I grinded for months to get my thermal imager, only for the game to lag and lose it all. Avoid this dumpster fire like it’s asking for child support—it’ll drain your time, patience, and any ounce of enjoyment you had. I totally wouldn't recommend it.

Example is gun modification. Another is storage. Why items don't stack (reduce storage if you think it affects balance)? Next is extraction. Why is there no time limit reminder? A simple "5 minutes til extraction opertator" then "3 minutes till extraction" you do have a radio after all?

Almost every match has a team running around with wall hacks, aim bot, and on mouse and keyboard. The report feature in the game apparently doesn't work.It feels like the idea of fighting against cheaters is to blatantly ignore them and hope that they get bored and eventually leave. Armor is either god or worthless. I've tanked shots with level 1 armor and instantly died with level 4 armor against level zero bullets. Basically, don't go past level 2 armor if you don't want to instantly die.

The game is awesome and as perfect as it gets for a fps on a mobile device. But they don't have any match making algorithms. Basically, you are matched with the first group of players that enter the mm lobby. Your rank means nothing in game. You will be matched with players who are as low as elite and expert if you are a legendary player. I have played the game since s1. I am a trailblazer, I understand you had to forgo the mm while having no playerbase, but it's been 1.5 years. It's time.

In this title, hackers are common but a lost fight is expensive in any case.
